GSD.description:
arm64: kasan: Revert "arm64: mte: reset the page tag in page->flags"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit db1fae1a8acdde4adf780dcd6e0500ed77ca157e. For more details please see the references link.
